title: Anivia Passive Bug

embed.description: All game passive wouldnt activate during a ranked solo queue game

body: Anyone had this happen? Was playing Anivia in Ranked solo queue and her passive wouldnt activate all game, not putting my lost LP completely on the bug but it definitely put me behind which sucked! Added a youtube link to one of the deaths.

replies.body: Yep, the passive was not on cooldown and yet you died without turning into an egg. That's a bug. Report it [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
